item.title: Markets climb in early trade
item.description: Markets climb in early trade Mumbai: Benchmark indices climbed in early trade Tuesday amid firm global market trends and as retail inflation dipped below the RBIâ€™s upper tolerance level of 6 per cent for the first time in 11 months in November.
